CustomField.formula:
IF(ISBLANK( Region_Name__c ), null,
IF(CONTAINS('US Buckeye:US Chicago Land:US Great Lakes:US Central:US Lone Star:US Mountain:US West:US Los Angeles:US South Bay:US Golden Gate:US North Star:US Pacific Northwest:US Pacific NW:US Islands', Region_Name__c ), 'West',
IF(CONTAINS('US No New England:US So New England:US Key Stone:US Garden State:US South Florida:US North Florida:US Southern:US Southeast:US SouthEast:US Capitol:US Chesapeake Bay:US Appalachian:US Metro NY:US Mississippi Delta', Region_Name__c ), 'East', IF(CONTAINS('CA Eastern Canada', Region_Name__c ), 'Canada East', IF(CONTAINS('CA Western Canada', Region_Name__c ), 'Canada West', IF(CONTAINS('CA Central', Region_Name__c ), 'Canada Central', IF(CONTAINS('CA Ontario', Region_Name__c ), 'Canada East', null)))))))
CustomField.label: District Name
